message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $140. I think it will be very valuable for you and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I would like to propose a lower price of $120. I hope we can come to an agreement.
I understand your position, Bob, but $120 is a bit too low for me.  Could you meet me halfway at $130?
I appreciate your response, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I am willing to offer $125. I hope this aligns better with what you're looking for.
